name: G.W.E.N.
description:
In a small village in the middle of a vast mountain valley, a genetically modified penguin, known as G.W.E.N, awakens only to discover that the home in which they had been made has been left abandoned. No humans are to be found in the small town. As the flyless bird searches for its creator, they realize that the town has been overrun by robots. It is up to the little penguin to stop the robots, locate clues as to what happened, and find a way to call for help. 

Will they manage to survive all alone in this robot-infested town?
